msgSnippet: You should pick up Kent Beck s Test Driven Development. Josh ... From: tumb@juno.com [mailto:tumb@juno.com] Sent: Tuesday, February 18, 2003 12:13 PM To:
messageBody:
You should pick up Kent Beck's Test Driven Development.

Josh

-----Original Message-----
From: tumb@... [mailto:tumb@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 18, 2003 12:13 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Management wants to know ...



Is there any recommended (or better yet documented) ideal level
of
testing?
Our company is working on adopting XP and perhaps test driven
practises.
We have a question about whether certain groups are testing too
little or
too much. How, if at all, do you determine what's too little or
too much?
